Reviews.Title: “The bed bugs bite.”
Reviews.Author: khalp
Reviews.Content: werent thrilled stay hotel busy weekend memphis decent booked paid nicer doubletree downtown ripoff overall ok stay albeit changed discovered bed bug bites morning week following stay contacted hotel directly report money returned calls care bitten finally determined bed bugs refused reimburse stay remained unapologetic taking national days inn company

HotelInfo.Name: Days Inn IH 40 & Sycamore View
